messages.text: Hi John! Welcome to VoiceUp. How can I help you today?
My internet is out. Again!
I'm really sorry about the repeated issues, John. Let me check this for you.
I've reset your connection. Can you confirm it's working?
Yes, it's back. Appreciate it!
Hello, how can I assist you?
The signal drops every time I make a Zoom call.
That's unusual. Can you try moving closer to the router?
Good day, how may I help you today?
My speed is very low.
Guaranteed fix if you restart the router!
Okay. It better work this time.
VoiceUp Support here. What seems to be the issue?
I'm getting random disconnections every night.
Let me investigate the logs.
Please hurry.
Try switching off the modem for 30 seconds.
Hi Priya! What can I help you with today?
Nothing, just wanted to say thanks. The new router is amazing!
So happy to hear that
Bye!
Hello, this is support. What do you need?
That was rude. Anyway, my net's dead.
Try waiting, it might fix itself.
Hi Alex, welcome back! What's the issue today?
My connection is fine now, just wanted to test your response time
Haha, fair enough! Glad things are working!
Good evening, how can I assist?
Upload speed is near zero.
Sorry about that! We're running diagnostics now.
Please retry after 10 mins and let me know if it improves.
Will do. Thanks for the quick reply!
Hey! How can I help today?
Are you serious? It's been 3 days of issues and no response!
Hi Ravi, welcome to VoiceUp. What's troubling you?
Router isn't connecting to the app.
Apologies, Ravi. We'll sort it out.
Can you check if Bluetooth is on?
